LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.description: Every participant will get a "got some lovin'" memory, but the negative effects of a bad quality orgy will be much more severe than usual. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.\nNote that all participants must be consenting adults. If the moral guide is not an adult the ritual will appear as blocked.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.0.label: orgy organizer present
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.0.d: The {0} was grotesque! When you think of an orgy, you tend to imagine attractive people. This was... the entire opposite. The mental images will take a while to go away.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.1.d: The {0} was awkward. Everyone sat around not knowing exactly what to do, naked bodies laying everywhere. Quite disappointing.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.2.d: The {0} was very sexy. We gave ourselves to each other in a communal expression of our deepest passions.
LanguageData.VME_OrgyRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.3.d: The {0} was exhilarating! We all donned our high-society masquerade masks and uncovered our bodies. A barrage of ecstasy unlike no other made our bodies tremble with barely concealed excitement.
